content.metaTitle: Villa Aquiles: Luxury 4BR Chalet Jávea €1,425,000 | Sea Views
content.metaDescription: Stunning modern villa in Monte Olimpo, Jávea. 4 bedrooms, panoramic sea views, 1000m² plot. Minutes from beach & golf. Premium Costa Blanca investment.
content.heroIntro:
Discover Villa Aquiles, an architectural masterpiece nestled in the prestigious Monte Olimpo residential area of Jávea. This exceptional 4-bedroom chalet represents the pinnacle of contemporary Mediterranean living, offering breathtaking panoramic views of both the sparkling Mediterranean Sea and the dramatic Montgó mountain range from its elevated 1000m² plot.

Designed with meticulous attention to detail by renowned developer Miralbo Urbana, this €1,425,000 luxury residence seamlessly blends modern sophistication with the relaxed Costa Blanca lifestyle. Every element has been carefully crafted to maximize the stunning natural surroundings, from the expansive floor-to-ceiling windows that flood the interior with natural light to the spacious sun terraces that provide the perfect setting for year-round outdoor entertaining.

locationSection.intro:
The prestigious Cap Martí - El Tossalet - Pinomar area of Jávea represents one of Costa Blanca's most coveted residential locations. Perched on elevated terrain in the Monte Olimpo development, Villa Aquiles enjoys a prime position that offers both tranquility and convenience, with the charming town center of Jávea just minutes away.

This exclusive location provides residents with the perfect balance of privacy and accessibility. The stunning Arenal Beach, with its golden sands and crystal-clear waters, is within easy reach, while the area's proximity to international schools, championship golf courses, and upscale shopping ensures all lifestyle needs are met without compromise.
highlights: Minutes from Arenal Beach and Javea's historic town center
Close proximity to Jávea Golf Club and premium sporting facilities
Easy access to international schools and educational facilities
Elevated position offering panoramic sea and mountain views
Well-connected to Valencia Airport (1 hour) and Alicante Airport (1.5 hours)

propertyFeatures.intro: Villa Aquiles showcases exceptional contemporary design across its intelligently planned 176m² of living space. The property's two-floor layout maximizes both the spectacular views and the Mediterranean indoor-outdoor lifestyle, with premium finishes and cutting-edge technology throughout.
features: 4 spacious bedrooms including luxurious master suite with panoramic views
4 modern bathrooms including en-suite facilities and guest powder room
Open-plan living and dining area with soaring ceilings
Fully equipped contemporary kitchen with adjoining utility room
Multiple terraces and outdoor entertaining spaces
Private swimming pool with Mediterranean garden landscaping
Floor-to-ceiling windows maximizing natural light and views
Premium materials and latest smart home technologies
Air conditioning and underfloor heating throughout

content.investmentSection:
Villa Aquiles represents an exceptional investment opportunity in one of Costa Blanca's most prestigious and stable property markets. Jávea's unique combination of natural beauty, premium amenities, and year-round appeal continues to attract discerning international buyers, ensuring strong capital appreciation potential and excellent rental yields for investors.

The property's prime location, contemporary design, and luxury specifications position it perfectly within Jávea's premium market segment. With limited new development opportunities in such prestigious locations, Villa Aquiles offers both lifestyle benefits and long-term investment security in a market that has consistently demonstrated resilience and growth.
whyBuySection: Panoramic sea and mountain views from an elevated, prestigious location
Contemporary architectural design with premium finishes throughout
Prime location minutes from beaches, golf, and international amenities
Excellent investment potential in Costa Blanca's most sought-after town
Large 1000m² private plot offering space and privacy
Built by renowned developer Miralbo Urbana with quality guarantee
Perfect for year-round living or luxury holiday home

faqs.question: What is the total price and are there flexible payment options available?
faqs.answer: Villa Aquiles is priced at €1,425,000. We can arrange flexible payment schedules during construction, and our mortgage specialists can help secure financing options for qualified buyers.

faqs.question: How close is the property to Jávea's beaches and amenities?
faqs.answer: The villa is just minutes from Arenal Beach and Jávea town center. The Golf Club, international schools, restaurants, and shopping are all within easy reach while maintaining a peaceful residential setting.

faqs.question: What is involved in the property buying process in Spain?
faqs.answer: Our team guides you through each step including legal checks, contract signing, and completion. The process typically takes 6-12 weeks and includes legal fees, taxes (around 10-12% total), and registration costs.

faqs.question: Can you help arrange mortgage financing for international buyers?
faqs.answer: Yes, Spanish banks offer mortgages to international buyers, typically up to 70% of property value. Our mortgage partner Habeno specializes in Costa Blanca properties and can arrange competitive rates.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential for this property?
faqs.answer: Luxury villas in Jávea with sea views command excellent rental rates, particularly during peak season. The property's prime location and amenities make it highly attractive to premium vacation rental markets.

faqs.question: When will Villa Aquiles be completed and ready for occupation?
faqs.answer: Construction timelines will be confirmed upon contract signing. Miralbo Urbana provides detailed project schedules and regular progress updates throughout the building process.

faqs.question: What fixtures, fittings, and appliances are included in the price?
faqs.answer: The villa includes fully fitted kitchen with appliances, built-in wardrobes, air conditioning, complete bathroom fittings, and landscaped gardens. A full specification list is available upon request.

faqs.question: How can I arrange a viewing of the villa and surrounding area?
faqs.answer: We can arrange site visits and area tours at your convenience. Contact us via WhatsApp or phone to schedule a viewing and discuss your requirements with our local property specialists.

content.conclusion: Villa Aquiles offers a rare opportunity to own a piece of Mediterranean paradise in one of Costa Blanca's most prestigious locations. With its stunning views, contemporary design, and prime Jávea location, this exceptional property represents both the ultimate lifestyle investment and a sound financial decision. Contact our team today to arrange a viewing and discover why Villa Aquiles could be your perfect Costa Blanca home.
